title: The Enchanted miller
creator_credit: Josef Vacha, Czechoslovak State Film and Official Films
brief_description: A cartoon version of a folk tale. A water demon has enchanted a mill and put its workers to flight. He torments them and continually evades their clutches by changing his shape. Finally they catch him and cut off his coat tails, thus depriving him of his magic powers.
